639250.name: Rival Books of Aster - Heptameron Starter Deck
639250.description:
This DLC contains 30 additional cards for the game Rival Books of Aster, and is a pre-built ready to play deck for the House Heptameron.

Once purchased, all cards can be used to customize your own decks.

Rival Books of Aster does NOT contain randomized booster packs. Play for free with a starter deck of your choice, and expand your collection with DLC packs containing known-quantities of cards.

THIS DLC UNLOCKS THE ABILITY TO BUILD HEPTAMERON HOUSE DECKS

*This is NOT a randomized booster pack. Exact content listed below. See screenshots for card details.

15 Heptameron House Cards
  • Talvi, The Spring
  • Ardarael, The Autumn
  • Farlas, The Winter
  • Abraym The Springtime Sun
  • Matasignais, The Autumn Moon
  • Agusita's Morning
  • Abragini's Shower
  • Talvian Defender
  • Farlas's Storm
  • Thamur
  • Ourer
  • Thamic
  • Jayon
  • Abai
  • Barol

15 Common Cards (playable by any house)
  • Camor
  • Carifas
  • Carnol
  • Mador
  • The Great Blockade
  • The Central Defense
  • Sirchade
  • Bucon
  • Mathon
  • Netos
  • Salam
  • Ruosiel
  • Drelmech
  • Sadimel
  • Xautiel
